snippet: The International Consumer Electronics Show has long enjoyed a central role in taking the pulse of the tech industry. But as the industry has changed, so has the significance of C.E.S.
abstract: The International Consumer Electronics Show has long enjoyed a central role in taking the pulse of the tech industry. But as the industry has changed, so has the significance of C.E.S.
lead_paragraph: LAS VEGAS -- The International Consumer Electronics Show has long enjoyed a central role in taking the pulse of the tech industry. But Microsoft recently announced that it would no longer exhibit at the show after this year. Other tech giants like Hewlett-Packard, Google and Facebook are keeping a low profile at the show, if they bother to show up at all. It all reflects shifts in the tech industry, as Nick Wingfield reported in Monday's New York Times.

headline.main: Video: The Changing Nature of the Consumer Electronics Show
